title: Must Watch: Colin Furze builds a shape-shifting bicycle out of hydraulic pistons
content:
Turns out, he’s built way more than this recently, like a bike with coil springs for tubes and a “social distancing” tall bike. But this bicycle with hydraulic pistons for tubes might be the most complex frame he’s built… The build process is almost like meditation, and the riding action showing how it works is […]

The post Must Watch: Colin Furze builds a shape-shifting bicycle out of hydraulic pistons appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
